properties.title: CREST
properties.description: Elaborate methods to merge aerosol extinction coefficient records from solar/lunar/stellar occultation and limb-scatter instruments and create a merged longterm multi-mission aerosol record. The objective is to increase the reliability of the data set by including multiple instruments measuring similar atmospheric quantities in the post-SAGE II period.
properties.osc:name: CLIMATE DATA RECORD OF STRATOSPHERIC AEROSOLS (CREST)
